Class FullDataBase

public class FullDataBase
extends java.lang.Object
The type Full data base.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private static java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,​RequestDataBase> users
    main DB of all the program. synchronized DB collection to protect the DB from all the threads that send data and received data from this DB.

      public void insertRequest​(int id, RequestDataBase rdb)
      Insert request method. when new user login - we create a RequestDataBase Object and insert to main Map with his ID.

    • insertData

      public static void insertData​(int id, int amountToAdd)
      static method - Insert data from the threads to the specific ID in the map.
      Parameters:
      id - the request id
      amountToAdd - the amount of images that found to User counter.

    • checkUrl

      public static boolean checkUrl​(java.lang.String url)
      static method - Check url boolean. check if the url is valid.
      Parameters:
      url - the url to check
      Returns:
      true if is valid, otherwise if no.
